alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 3:56AM CDT until May 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa...Missouri... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19, Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Bellevue LD12, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.4 feet, U.S. Highway 61 closes at the bridge over the Des Moines River between Alexandria and Keokuk. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:10 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 17.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain around 17.6 feet today. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
